content.text: 1 pound sliced bacon, cut into thirds
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 pound sliced bacon, cut into thirds" )
( ing-1 "1 (14 ounce) package beef cocktail wieners" )

content.text: 3/4 cup brown sugar, or to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "3/4 cup brown sugar, or to taste" )

content.text: 0) Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "the oven"@11:19 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "325 degrees F"@23:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "165 degrees C"@38:51 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Refrigerate 2/3 of the bacon until needed.
2) Wrap each cocktail wiener with a piece of bacon and secure with a toothpick.
3) Place on a large baking sheet.
4) Sprinkle brown sugar generously over all.
5) Bake for 40 minutes in the preheated oven, until the sugar is bubbly.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "40 minutes"@12:22 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "the preheated oven"@26:44 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until the sugar is bubbly"@46:71 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) To serve, place the wieners in a slow cooker and keep on the low heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "place"@13:18 / AC
		:prp ( purp-6-0 "To serve"@3:11 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( "the wieners"@19:30 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-6-0 "a slow cooker"@34:47 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "keep"@52:56 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-6-0 "the low heat"@60:72 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)
